entries.task00_task_display_string_1: Return to Loche in the Ranged Combat Training Room
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Well done. The next thing that you need to know about is how to get yourself out of a brawl intact. Talk to Rydel about unarmed fighting. Rydel is in the Close Combat Training Room.
entries.task03_task_display_string_1: Return to Rydel Delan in the Close Combat Training Center
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Great job, kid. Now you can do something else for me. Come back to Hangar Bay 2 and I'll teach ya more about being a Smuggler.
